articles.author: Al Jazeera
articles.title: BepiColombo: Europe-Japan space mission captures Mercury images - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: BepiColombo is on a mission to study all aspects of Mercury, from its core to surface processes and magnetic field.
articles.content:
A joint European-Japanese spacecraft has sent back its first images of Mercury, the nearest planet to the Sun.
The European Space Agency said the BepiColombo mission made the first of six flybys of … [+3105 chars]

articles.title: Europe-Japan space mission gets 1st glimpse of Mercury - CGTN
articles.description: A joint European-Japanese spacecraft got its first glimpse of Mercury as it swung by the solar system's innermost planet while on a mission to deliver two probes into orbit in 2025.
